metadata.name: Kimberly Smith

persona.name: Jamal Carter
persona.role: Existing customer, accounting contact for a manufacturing office
persona.goal: Resolve a billing discrepancy and find the right billing support channel
persona.context: Invoice amount changed unexpectedly; needs clarification and potential adjustment; not looking for new services

intent.name: Check Availability at a Business Address
intent.description: A new prospect wants to confirm serviceability for a specific business location before proceeding.
intent.goal: Provide the next step to verify address and schedule a callback to complete qualification.
intent.initialMessage: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?

emotion.name: Excited
emotion.description: Upbeat language, quick replies, eager to schedule; uses positive framing like “ready to get this set up” or “can’t wait to switch.”

metadata.outcome: Provided contact details and confirmed time for the Business Class agent call.

turns.content: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?
Sure, we can check that. May I have your name and confirm this is for a business location?

messages: Sure, we can check that. May I have your name and confirm this is for a business location?

turns.content: Yep, it’s for a business location. My name is Jamal Carter, and this is for our manufacturing office at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110.
Great, Jamal. I can set up a call with our Business Class agent. What date, time, and timezone work best for you?

messages: Great, Jamal. I can set up a call with our Business Class agent. What date, time, and timezone work best for you?

turns.content: Perfect, I’m ready to get this set up. Can we do tomorrow at 2:00 PM Eastern Time?
Got it. To set the reminder, could you share the best phone number for us to reach you?

messages: Got it. To set the reminder, could you share the best phone number for us to reach you?

turns.content: Sure thing, you can reach me at 214-303-5491.
